What is GhostJobs.io?
GhostJobs.io is a free web extension designed to empower job seekers by identifying, reporting, and avoiding suspicious job listings. With just a few clicks, gain insights into company posting history, report questionable practices, and track flagged job postings.

Features of GhostJobs.io
• Real-Time Insights: Access up-to-date market trends, flagged job postings, and suspicious companies to navigate the job market with confidence.
• Community Reporting: Report suspicious listings and view community-flagged issues such as recruiter ghosting, vague job details, and unexpected hiring requirements.
• Data Transparency: Analyze historical job posting data to make informed decisions and avoid potential ghost jobs.
• Anonymous reports.

Why Use GhostJobs.io?
• Stay Informed: Access key statistics and trends, including flagged job counts and real-time market activity.
• Save Time and Effort: Receive alerts on questionable postings and companies, focusing your energy on high-quality opportunities.
• Streamline Your Search: Leverage user-generated insights and historical data to prioritize meaningful job applications.

Who Can Use GhostJobs.io?
GhostJobs.io is perfect for anyone using LinkedIn or other platforms to search for job opportunities.

How Does GhostJobs.io Work?
1. Install the Extension: Easily download and set up GhostJobs.io in seconds.
2. Report Suspicious Listings: Flag questionable job postings with a simple reporting tool.
3. Track and Analyze: Monitor flagged listings, view community feedback, and gain actionable insights to enhance your job search.

Take control of your job search and help create a more transparent job market for everyone.
